## Spatial Data Science

-   Pebesma, Edzer, and Roger Bivand. 2023. [*Spatial Data Science: With Applications in R*](https://r-spatial.org/book/). 1st edition. Boca Raton: CRC.

-   Lovelace, Robin, Jakub Nowosad, and Jannes Muenchow. 2025. [*Geocomputation with R*](https://r.geocompx.org/index.html). 2nd edition. Boca Raton: CRC.

-   Wimberly, Michael C. 2023. [*Geographic Data Science with R: Visualizing and Analyzing Environmental Change*](https://bookdown.org/mcwimberly/gdswr-book/). 1st edition. Boca Raton London New York: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Anselin, Luc. 2024. [*An Introduction to Spatial Data Science with GeoDa: Volume 1: Exploring Spatial Data*](https://lanselin.github.io/introbook_vol1/). 1st edition. Boca Raton, FL: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Anselin, Luc. 2024. [*An Introduction to Spatial Data Science with GeoDa: Volume 2: Clustering Spatial Data*](https://lanselin.github.io/introbook_vol2/). 1st edition. Boca Raton, FL: Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Rey, Sergio, Dani Arribas-Bel, and Levi John Wolf. 2023. [*Geographic Data Science with Python*](https://geographicdata.science/book/intro.html). 1st edition. Boca Raton: CRC.

-   Anselin, Luc, Grant Morrison, Angela Li, and Karina Acosta. 2023. *Hands-on Spatial Data Science with R*. [https://spatialanalysis.github.io/handsonspatialdata/index.html](https://spatialanalysis.github.io/handsonspatialdata/).

-   Sabbata, Stefano De. 2024. *R for Geographic Data Science*. <https://sdesabbata.github.io/r-for-geographic-data-science/>.

-   Comber, Lex. 2023. *GeoComputation and Spatial Analysis Practicals*. <https://bookdown.org/lexcomber/GEOG3195/>.

-   Davis, Jerry, and SFSU Institute for Geographic Information Science. 2024. *Introduction to Environmental Data Science*. <https://bookdown.org/igisc/EnvDataSci/>.

-   Dorman, Michael. 2023. *Introduction to Spatial Data Programming with R*. <https://geobgu.xyz/r/>.

-   Spatial Data Science with R. <https://rspatial.org/raster/>.

-   Spatial Data Science with R and "terra". <https://rspatial.org/>.

-   Paez, Antonio. 2024. *An Introduction to Spatial Data Analysis and Statistics: A Course in R*. <https://paezha.github.io/spatial-analysis-r/>.

-   Moraga, Paula. 2023. [*Spatial Statistics for Data Science: Theory and Practice with R*](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-spatial/). 1st edition. Boca Raton: CRC.

-   Rowe, Francisco, and Dani Arribas-Bel. 2024. Spatial Modelling for Data Scientists. <https://gdsl-ul.github.io/san/>.

-   *Geomatics for Environmental Management: An Open Textbook for Students and Practitioners*.  <https://www.opengeomatics.ca/>.

-   Arribas-Bel, Francisco Rowe, Dani. 2023. *Spatial Modelling for Data Scientists*. <https://gdsl-ul.github.io/san/>.

-   Lovelace, Robin, and Morgane Dumont. 2017. [*Spatial Microsimulation with R*](https://spatial-microsim-book.robinlovelace.net/index.html). 1st edition. Chapman; Hall/CRC.

-   Branion-Calles, Michael. 2021. *A Crash Course in Geographic Information Systems (GIS) Using R*. <https://bookdown.org/michael_bcalles/gis-crash-course-in-r/>.
